title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: Standard Assessment of Learning Design and Customized Instructional Method Application Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational understanding of social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate and analyze various instructional methods using the IMS Learning Design standard.
Learners can automatically/manually form groups and assign roles for collaborative activities in an LMS environment.
Learners can establish personalized learning plans using prior knowledge diagnostic tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
